recipes.name: Banana Oat Pancakes
recipes.ingredients:
1 ripe banana
1 egg
1/2 cup rolled oats
1/4 teaspoon baking powder (optional for fluffiness)
A pinch of salt
recipes.instructions:
Mash the banana in a bowl until smooth.
Add the egg and mix until well combined.
Stir in the oats, baking powder, and salt to form a batter.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and lightly grease it with oil or butter.
Pour small amounts of batter (about 2 tablespoons) into the pan to form pancakes.
Cook for 1-2 minutes on each side, or until golden brown.
Serve warm with your favorite toppings like syrup, fruit, or yogurt.

recipes.name: Garlic Butter Sirloin Steak
recipes.ingredients:
(12-oz) sirloin steaks or ribeye steaks
1 tablespoon olive oil
3 tablespoons unsalted butter
2 garlic cloves, minced
1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley (optional)
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
recipes.instructions:
Prepare the Steak:

Pat the steaks dry with a paper towel.
Season both sides generously with salt and pepper. Let them sit at room temperature for 20 minutes.
Cook the Steak:

Heat a heavy skillet (cast iron preferred) over medium-high heat. Add olive oil.
When the oil is hot and shimmering, add the steaks.
Sear for 3–4 minutes on each side for medium-rare, or longer for your desired doneness.
Make the Garlic Butter:

Lower the heat to medium. Add the butter and garlic to the skillet.
Use a spoon to baste the steaks with the melted garlic butter for 1–2 minutes.
Rest and Serve:

Remove the steaks from the skillet and let them rest for 5 minutes to retain juices.
Sprinkle with parsley and serve hot with your favorite sides, such as mashed potatoes or sautéed vegetables.

recipes.name: English Breakfast Recipe
recipes.ingredients:
2 eggs

2 sausages

2 slices of bacon

1 tomato, halved

1 cup baked beans

2 slices of toast

1/2 cup mushrooms, sliced

1 tbsp butter

1 tsp olive oil

Salt and pepper to taste
recipes.instructions:
Prepare the Ingredients:

Slice the mushrooms and halve the tomato.

Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).

Cook the Sausages and Bacon:

Heat a pan over medium heat and cook the sausages until browned and fully cooked.

In the same pan, fry the bacon until crispy.

Grill the Tomato and Toast:

Place the tomato halves on a baking tray, drizzle with olive oil, and season with salt and pepper.

Toast the bread slices until golden brown.

Sauté the Mushrooms:

Heat butter in a pan and sauté the mushrooms until tender.

Cook the Eggs:

Fry or scramble the eggs as preferred.

Heat the Baked Beans:

Warm up the baked beans in a saucepan over low heat.

Assemble the Breakfast:

Arrange all the cooked items on a plate and serve hot.
